tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NetworkCoverage (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name STRING,
  region STRING,
  network_type STRING,
  coverage_area FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE network_nodes (
  node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  node_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE network_edges (
  edge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_node_id INT,
  end_node_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2),
  bandwidth INT
);

CREATE TABLE regions (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name VARCHAR(50),
  coverage_area INT
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  region_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(region_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_id INT,
    area_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    data_usage DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  coverage_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE network_nodes (
  node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  node_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  node_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE networks (
  network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  network_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  network_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  coverage_area_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (coverage_area_id) REFERENCES coverage_areas(area_id)
)

CREATE TABLE node_connections (
  connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_node_id INT NOT NULL,
  destination_node_id INT NOT NULL,
  connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_node_id) REFERENCES network_nodes(node_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (destination_node_id) REFERENCES network_nodes(node_id)
)

CREATE TABLE usage_statistics (
  statistics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  node_id INT NOT NULL,
  usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
  total_traffic INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES network_nodes(node_id)
)
